data.name: Pixel Game Maker MV - Magical Sound Adventure -Light
data.detailed_description:
This collection contains all the music needed for general platform games, that covers the Opening to the Ending!
The collection is themed around a bright fantasy world, which is ideal for action games with a fun atmosphere! It can also be used in an amusement park setting.

Of course, as with Pixel Game Maker MV, you can use it as BGM for not only platform games, but also for a variety of other game genres. The sky is the limit!

Content:
1: A Tale of a Distant Country (Opening)
2: Dancing with the Wind (Stage)
3: Through the trees (Sage)
4: Glimmering Lane (Stage)
5: The Land of Hot Sand (Stage)
6: Small Explorers (Stage)
7: Castle of Time (Stage)
8: Assault! (Battle)
9: Iron gatekeeper (Battle)
10: Stormy (Battle)
11: Arrival! (Stage Clear)
12: I’ve been hit (Miss)
13: See you tomorrow (Game Over)
14: Get up! (Continue)
15: This world to love (Ending)
